comments:
I tried on RC1_12020059 with Kathy Chan's org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui_1.0.0.jar

Then I got this:

If memory serves, we integrated changes in Web services recently that depend on corresponding changes in facets. If that's the case, then patching RC1 with a more current Web services plugin is the most likely cause of the NSME, in which event you should will either need to pick up additional plugins from HEAD, or - perhaps better - upgrade to the latest RC2.

Kathy, can you confirm this?

I was asking Raymond to try out Gil's fix for bug 117930 (AddModuleDependency for Java project).  I only sent him the jst.ws.consumption.ui.jar and he found problem with running BUJAVA because of that JAR has dependency on other plugins.  That's when he opened bug this bug.

I just sent him the other JARs for jst.consumption and jst.creation.ui, if that still does not work, it would probably be best to try selfhosting with the new set of jst.ws plugins or wait for an official AST driver that contains the fix for bug 117930 (https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=117930) before verifying that fix.  That fix shoud be in WTP RC2 build 12080419.
